channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NC
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NC

item.title: Report E-2024040278
item.description:
Report E-2024040278

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-15T03:04:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-17
  • City: CHARLOTTE
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: GROENDYKE TRANSPORT INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 316549
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: Driver dropped a trailer at a repair facility not realizing there was still product in the trailer. This collapsed the dolly legs which dropped the trailer causing 2900 gals of EUG to spill onto the ground
